high_descs: Turn around, walk to the side of the bed
Grab the green pillow near the edge
Turn right, walk to the desk
Turn on the lamp on the desk
anns.task_desc: Grab the green pillow, turn on the lamp

high_descs: Move to the right of the bed.
Pick up the pillow in the middle of the bed.
Bring the pillow to the lamp on the desk..
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine the pillow in the light on the desk.

high_descs: approach the right side of the bed
grab a pillow off of the bed
turn around and walk to the desk
turn on the lamp on the top of the desk
anns.task_desc: turn on the lamp while holding a pillow
